com.qtfx.lib.db

Class PageRecordSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.db.RecordSet
      • com.qtfx.lib.db.PageRecordSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Record>

    public class PageRecordSet
extends RecordSet
    A PageRecordSet is a RecordSet that first paginates the underliying Persistor and Criteria. It is aimed to be used when the underlying view is very large and visually browse is required.

    Note that they can not be greater that NumberUtils.MAX_INTEGER.

    Additionally, this PageRecordSet can not be sorted since it strictly uses the underlying order of the persistor.

    Author:
    Miquel Sas
